episodes.title: How To Be A Cult Leader
episodes.description:
In this satirical yet informative video, Dr. Barrett, psychological scientist and president of Blueprint 1543, draws from classic social psychology to outline “How to Be a Cult Leader.” Based on research from "Age of Propaganda" by Pratkanis and Aronson, he unpacks 12 techniques cult leaders commonly use to manipulate followers—from isolating members and creating alternate realities to manufacturing emotional highs and encouraging self-censorship. While the presentation is playful, the implications are serious: these tactics show up not just in fringe religious movements, but also in influencer culture, politics, fandoms, and more. Learn what to watch out for—and why psychological literacy matters more than ever in the digital age.
